cortex.demos.demos_neuroimaging package¶

Submodules¶

cortex.demos.demos_neuroimaging.rbm_ni module¶

Demo for training RBM with MRI or fMRI dataset.

Try with python rbm_ni.py rbm_olin.yaml.

cortex.demos.demos_neuroimaging.rbm_ni.init_inference_args(n_chains=10, persistent=False, n_steps=1)[source]¶
cortex.demos.demos_neuroimaging.rbm_ni.init_learning_args(learning_rate=0.0001, optimizer='sgd', l2_decay=0.0, l1_decay=0.0, optimizer_args=None, learning_rate_schedule=None, batch_size=100, valid_batch_size=100, epochs=100, valid_key='nll', valid_sign='+', excludes=['rbm_visible_log_sigma'])[source]¶
cortex.demos.demos_neuroimaging.rbm_ni.train(out_path=None, name='', model_to_load=None, save_images=True, test_every=None, show_every=None, dim_h=None, preprocessing=None, learning_args=None, inference_args=None, dataset_args=None)[source]¶

cortex.demos.demos_neuroimaging.vae module¶

Demo for training VAE.

Try with python vae.py vae_mri.yaml.

cortex.demos.demos_neuroimaging.vae.init_learning_args(learning_rate=0.0001, learning_rate_schedule=None, l2_decay=0.0, optimizer='rmsprop', optimizer_args=None, n_posterior_samples=20, batch_size=100, valid_batch_size=100, epochs=100, valid_key='-log p(x)', valid_sign='+', excludes=['gaussian_log_sigma', 'gaussian_mu'])[source]¶
